website_summaries.verdict: Meal prep with this reasonably priced steamer is easy and efficient, provided you don't mind its few inconveniences.
pros: Can steam up to three dishes at once
cons: Doesn't come with a rice bowl
The three containers are a bit small and awkward to store

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS STEAMER!!! The food comes out pretty good for most part and I love cooking marinated chicken in it, plus fish...Everything comes out nice and juicy...I haven't tried any red meat, just chicken, fish, & eggs in tin foil...I gave it a four because the plastic containers are really flimsy feeling, so if you press too hard while cleaning them, they will easily break...The plastic containers are somewhat a pain to clean because the food sticks to them easily while cooking, then all the food residue gets stuck in the holes at the bottom...I also wasn't a fan of the rice bowl, so I won't be using that for rice...
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my steamer
customer_reviews.text: Omg talk about a time saver! I absolutely love my steamer! I cook whole meals in minutes. Get home from work and put my meal in and by the time I'm out of the shower is done! i can eat relax and be in bed 2 hours earlier than before! This makes a huge difference to someone that works 12 hour shifts 7days a week. Or anybody looking to save time during the day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it alot
customer_reviews.text: Like probably most of you I read the other reviews. And I have owned many steamers over the years. So I decided to buy this one....and I like it a lot. To those that say it's cheap...not so. I think if you are respectful...clean it...that this steamer will last for years. It's a basic steamer under $20. Get real...what do you expect? Interesting that it has 3 stackable layers. It seems to me the first layer closest to the steaming water gets more steam and cooks faster. So that is where I place carrots and items that take more time. Experiment with it...it really is compact and will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: David Glazer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mini Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Oyster 2tier steamer. When I saw this I saw 3 and knew I wanted it. Not only do both brands have parts that fit, this mini steamer is also easy to pack for travel. I used it for heating face towels when doing in home massages. Other than food of course. I love the other plastic bowl that came with it. I can steam rice in it or shrimp in butter. The picture guide for the timer helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cappy

customer_reviews.title: This a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This a great product!! I use it all the time. I keep the steamer on my counter top and have plenty of space to cook. I cant wait until the holidays it will cut my cooking time in half. cooks eggs, corn on the cob, broccoli in know time. i would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer, it worked so well. I've used it for eggs and broccoli and plan to use it for my brown rice this weekend. It's easy to use just add water, food, and set the timer and it works great. The cook containers stick together and could be hard to separate so you will need to keep the plastic bags to wrap each container so it will not be difficult to separate. Overall, this is a great item.
customer_reviews.author: QT1007

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - stopped working after 3 times
customer_reviews.text: Literally used this steamer 3 times with very small amounts of carrot/apple to make baby food, now it stopped working. The light comes on when plugging it in, but the water never gets warm and therefore no steam. Complete rubbish. It's made of very cheap materials, feels cheap, and doesn't work, would never recommend to anyone possibly worst product I ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Never ever stack them without the separators unless you want a fight getting them apart. Mine arrived with only one separator and stacking them was inevitable. After washing and drying each container I stacked them in the cabinet. I couldn't get them apart without breaking them so I put it all back in the box and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaGA

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you can cook rice and grains in this steamer
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. Product info does not address cooking rice or other grains, and there are no instructions in the packaging. However, it has so far done a fine job of steaming rice, barley and lentils. I actually like this one better than the more expensive, larger steamer that this replaces (broken) because the steamer trays are a single piece and are not as flexible, which make it easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Do better
customer_reviews.text: I tried the multi rack containers but the heat didn't distribute well enough to the top so I stuck to the 1 tier. Also took longer to cook than my older Oster steamer. The marking labels in front of unit rubbed off from fish oil. The unit died, smelled of burning parts coming from vent after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kbunni

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for the gentle cook
customer_reviews.text: Have used it a few times and it does a great job. Each tier is a bit small for long items. Need to be gentle. pretty thin plastic. For the price you can't go wrong (if you are gentle). One usage note, less water is better, it bubbles out if too full.
customer_reviews.author: Papagil39

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer! I’ve used it instead of boiling eggs in a pan and it’s wonderful. It’s very easy to clean and use. Just add water at the bottom and stack items you want to steam.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I is perfect for our needs. I usually just use one but on occasion have used two trays. I love that it is set by a timer. The other one I had would go till the water boiled out. It is easy to clean and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: J and B

customer_reviews.title: No buzzer or beeper.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is a little thinner than I expected. Also, when the timet goes out there's no buzzer, just a click. May want to set an alarm at the same time. Otherwise it's what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Orr

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.text: WORST PRODUCT EVER! I received the steamer as described except for the fact that tow of the steam baskets are stuck together and I can not get them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dodds

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months, corroded and stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: After only 5 months of light use, the heat plate in the base had begun rusting or corroding away with every use, and last night the unit started making a loud noise, and now has stopped heating water altogether. I was pleased up until now, but I guess you get what you pay for. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. I love it ans very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... it cause it didn't come with the rice bowl like it said
customer_reviews.text: I had order this item and had to retrun it cause it didn't come with the rice bowl like it said. Thats the only reason I bought this item...I reorder the same one hoping the problem would be fix, but it wasn't to my luck!!...this was a gift for someone and it isn't all there. I feel when you advertise something, you should get all what you bought!!...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance!
customer_reviews.text: First it is so easy to use. Being vegan I can put three different veggies in, and within 15-30 mins I have a great meal. It saves so much time. I would definitely tell anyone to purchase this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Flores

customer_reviews.title: OKAY FOR THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I give this product a five star rating, because It works well for a bargain food steamer without all the extras. I'm very satisfied, because the food (vegetables, etc.) are cooked. However, I do wish this steamer would have had another light, in the base, that would automatically come on to keep the food warm within the plastic bowl(s) once the timer light would shut off indicating cooking is complete. That's something that Ovente would eventually have to add to the base of the steamer. Other than that, I would recommend this item to anyone who is looking for an inexpensive, economical food steamer that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Pacific Northwest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for new moms
customer_reviews.text: A great steamer. I use it for steaming vegetables for my twin boys. I am able to make meals for the week on my days off and with twins anytime saved is priceless!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to clean. It would be nice if the container can be separated and clean by dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just fantastic. Plastic is thin. Don't double stack without the rings. Don't drop. But it works really good!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: The easy steamer
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to use and clean .Low mantainance ,versatyl have many usesboiling eggs ,,steam veggies ,fish ,bunds ,wontons and many others foods .
customer_reviews.author: Lesbia Rosado Velez

customer_reviews.title: Ovente 3 Tier Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my Ovente 3 Tier Steamer , I have been cooking non-stop since I received the steamer in the mail. I made hard boiled eggs and chicken breasts and corned beef and baby carrots. So awesome meals, melts in your mouth. I would recommend this Steamer to everyone. For under twenty dollars I got a Good Deal .
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Olson

customer_reviews.title: I do not like that the bowls don't nest
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that the bowls don't nest, and you have third rings to clean. Why to much extra work! But it runs fine for the two days I have had it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Lavold

customer_reviews.title: Nice item to have
customer_reviews.text: It takes up minimal space and works well. I would have loved to give a higher score but the bowls are extremely flimsy. They make me nervous everytime I use it that a bang against something will crack it
customer_reviews.author: Sha-rone

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: Nice but was much smaller than I realized. Cost too much to return. I will have to resell it to someone else. I should pay better attention to return policies so I know who to purchase from.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Nice but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap timer that doesn't hold time right but other than that works great. Cooks fast
customer_reviews.author: sara brown

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long maybe 2 months takes a little longer to cook but for the price can't complain it's a good starter
customer_reviews.author: franz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Just what I needed and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: TWC_Inc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great !
customer_reviews.text: Very east to use and clean. Cooks veggies and dumplings amazing !
customer_reviews.author: DeMita

customer_reviews.title: Great for time saving!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Ovente Steamer! I can cook multiple meals at once for myself or a big family meal without having to stand in the kitchen and watch every second! What a life saver
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Ok for small amounts
customer_reviews.text: This does small jobs nicely but if you want to steam vegetables for 4 people or more, you'll need a more sturdy steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Jake's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer!
customer_reviews.text: We like the steamer but it’s hard to store when not using because containers will not come apart so has to be sited in fullly assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone have not heard anything back so must be working ok
customer_reviews.author: Donald I Pirches Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is a steal for the price. I've been using it almost daily for the past month I've had it.
customer_reviews.author: Private for obvious reason

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy food for people that’s going on a diet or just in a hurry.
customer_reviews.text: I would use this for a a long time it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Newsome

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: its just ok, cheaply made. atleast no aluminum. most steamers made wih aluminum lid
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased as I can get way more done with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Joel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Meh....Give it a pass
customer_reviews.text: No rice bowl included like jt mentioned in the photo. Plastic is very thin and timer has no ding to let you know it's done. Honestly, I might return this.
customer_reviews.author: PYT93

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great so far. I have used this steamer quite a bit. My meat or vegetables come out great. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: real disappointment anyway. Plastic material
customer_reviews.text: I guess the price should have been a fair warning... real disappointment anyway. Plastic material, smaller than is look on the pictures - small holes for the steam, so when one tier is full, the other one does not receive its share of heat. Worse, the food drips directly in the resistance bowl. To summarize, only good for eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Rice Basket
customer_reviews.text: This products works well but was to include a rice basket. This is one of the main reasons I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good priced steamer...
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking it was a rice steamer as well, but I didn't notice that all the bowls have steam holes in the bottom!! No biggie, it does a great job on vegetables, fish, etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are satisfied and love their new steamer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift for my folks. They are satisfied and love their new steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita418

customer_reviews.title: This is a trash item
customer_reviews.text: This is a trash please dont buy it, don’t works
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO TELL IF ITS ON..
customer_reviews.text: ISN'T HARD TO USE..(AN NO TEFLON..FLAKE..) SORTA BETTER TO USE 1st LAYER.. ABIT EASIER.. SUPER CAREFULL.. HOT..STEAM.. I DO NOT COOK.. STEAM.. IF I FEEL TIRED..
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY MOORE

customer_reviews.title: It steams fine but the condensation from bottom runs on counter
customer_reviews.text: The plastic steamer bowls are very flimsy and small. It steams fine but the condensation from bottom runs on counter. I will keep it but wouldnt buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Paula L. Luthi

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love the steamer. I was in process of ordering a double bowl when this one popped up and I order this instead. I love that I have plenty of room to steam 3 different things in stead of 2. If you didn't want to steam 3 items you can only do 1. Everything cooks out good. I don't usually eat things like carrots and broccoli but with the steamer I love them now. Directions are very easy to follow. The steam is very easy to clean up and store. Dishwasher safe which is always a plus. Overall I would highly recommend this product to anyone who was looking or asking about one.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Turnbow Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to clean. Plus it's big enough so I can do all my meal prep at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timer quit working on the third time very unhappy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Timer quit working on the third time very unhappy with the product
customer_reviews.author: George Blackerby

customer_reviews.title: No Rice Bowl Included
customer_reviews.text: Third picture on Amazon shows "Rice Bowl Included" no rice bowl is included with the product. Purchased product specifically to use as rice cooker/vegetable steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Krautheim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer and i use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Robert Carbin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not have rice bowl as stated in description and/or pictures when ordered (has since been removed). Returning.
customer_reviews.author: M Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wondering if I got a returned product because the one ...
customer_reviews.text: Wondering if I got a returned product because the one I got missing one layer!! I couldn't set them apart!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: this machine is great! I can now steam large batches of veggies ...
customer_reviews.text: this machine is great! I can now steam large batches of veggies at once vs. the steam insert method.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We have done multiple types of vegetables eggs and fish already. Comes out great everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Chris rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: it is an amazing steamer we use it all the time going to ...
customer_reviews.text: it is an amazing steamer we use it all the time going to be ordering another soon as a gift
customer_reviews.author: norman moody

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bottom two tiers constantly stick together and are super difficult to separate. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: No chime on timer
customer_reviews.text: Great product but timer doesn’t alarm you when the time is up. It needs a chime when time is up
customer_reviews.author: Adam Dyes

customer_reviews.title: greatest investment especially for seafood lovers
customer_reviews.text: use it all the time, greatest investment especially for seafood lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Plastic and thin! Hard to separate the bowls as ...
customer_reviews.text: Plastic and thin! Hard to separate the bowls as they stick together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: There is a ring missing when I open the pacaage
customer_reviews.author: kang

customer_reviews.title: Worth for money but not a good quality
customer_reviews.text: Worth for the money we pay but Quality of lids is very delicate.
customer_reviews.author: harsha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A gift for out of state college student, haven't heard back. However appearance was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap is what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic steamer tiers made of fragile plistic. Was difficult to unstack without cracking. rice bowl so small I don't think it could hold a full cup of cooked rice. The photo is decepttive.
customer_reviews.author: pedi nurse

customer_reviews.title: unstable
customer_reviews.text: Tried once, I steamed sea bass and corns. Works fast but a little bit plastic taste on the food. Not sure is the plastic BPA free. unstable. (Made in China)
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts in package
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with only one of the white connector rings. This means it is impossible to use all three containers at once since the rings connect the containers when in use. I would prefer not to go through the hassle of returning the item so I am submitting a one-star review in hopes that Ovente will correct this by sending me the missing part. If this issue is corrected I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Frush

customer_reviews.title: Value steamer
customer_reviews.text: It's versatile and useful steamer for preparing meals. Price point is for the masses.
customer_reviews.author: Syl

customer_reviews.title: Unit was larger than 3 half cup size described (more like 3 one quart size)
customer_reviews.text: Probably worth the cost, but, not as advertised. Unit was larger than 3 half cup size described (more like 3 one quart size). Rather fragile looking, however unit does work satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: ezsea

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it about two months,it`s leaking,and can not work any more...
customer_reviews.author: Yanyi Ma

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Waste of money. Cheaply made and makes a huge mess. Returned a month ago and have yet to see my money back.
customer_reviews.author: danielle.leanne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It already has been thrown away. The water leaked and the element burned on the second use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and convenient steamer
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow! This thing really steams vegetables nicely. Mini corn cobs were extremely juicy and flavorful, as were the red mini potatoes, broccoli, and mini carrots. Everything had a great taste and was full of flavor. The multiple tiers allowed for a good assortment of vegetables to be conveniently steamed at the same time, with excellent results. Cleanup is a snap and storage is simple: just stack everything up and store it in a corner. All of the vegetables are extremely flavorful, not bland or water-logged.
customer_reviews.author: NYCSteeler

customer_reviews.title: I love it the plastic pieces can stick together thou becareful
customer_reviews.text: ordered this a while back finally used it. I love it the plastic pieces can stick together thou becareful. i cooked 2 ears of corn and 2 pieces of chicken and some baby carrots and i put some rice in the bowl i added a little bit of water to help it cook directions dont state when to put the water you add it to the bottom piece. i put it on 10 minutes and that wasn't enough so i put it back on another 10 minutes and it cooked everything perfect. so i do def recommend the produce and it was a great price also!!!
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: No removable base!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned a couple different steamers now and the design of this one sucks. Most steamers come with a removable base that the water sits in so you don't have to worry about getting the internals wet when cleaning it. This one does not have that option. The trays and tiers are too small and it started leaking after a few months. To top it all off, the red cover for the indicator light actually melted.... Stopped using it after that. All in all it did do its job of steaming whatever we were able to fit in it but I recommend looking for a different steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Really small sections, tiers stick together and must be pried apart with force
customer_reviews.text: Way too small to handle even a small whole cauliflower. Not only that, the three clear plastic tiers nest, but stick together and I had to practically break it to get them apart. When I nested them back, they stuck together again. I can't say how this thing works because it never got that far - I couldn't even start to use it for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: BettinaH

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, takes a min or 2 and it's ready to be steaming your food. The timer is really helpful for people who forgets to check on their food. Just set the timer and let it do it's job. The 3 layer makes it very easy for you to steam more food. This steamer is very easy to be use and very easy to clean. Really recommend for people who likes to steam food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Results!
customer_reviews.text: Legit just made the best soft boiled eggs I've ever had. Super easy to use, easy to wash, and it turns off automatically! That's super great with how forgetful I am lol
customer_reviews.author: TrippNessa

customer_reviews.title: Watch out opening this!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a steamer I’ve had for many years. This works satisfactorily, but the steamer basket and lid are very shoddy materials. There is no lid handle to lift with. The first time I took the lid off it slipped and I was burned by the rising steam. Be careful. I’ve found now to stand behind it and lift away from me for safety.
customer_reviews.author: VaGirl

customer_reviews.title: My top ring got lost
customer_reviews.text: Please, I need the top ring. It got lost. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and very useful
customer_reviews.text: This steamer costs very little but it is efficient and effective as a vegetable steamer. The veggies come out tasting great without any seasoning being added. We really enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: KOBAM

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mother for Christmas. She steams everything but not in huge portions since it is just her and my gram. This was perfect! She fell in love with it immediately. Everything comes packaged nicely and arrives fast with Prime Shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but nice
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews. Plastic’s very thin. Streams slowly. Does a nice job. Looks like nesting the bowls for storage is a horrible idea. Also don’t stick your hand on top of it to see if it’s hot. It is. Burning burning hot steam.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Spearin

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: The water boils up into the first basket and water flooded onto my counter top the entire time I was steaming veggies or the rice. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Grandma Approved
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is handy for multiple item cooking. The reservoir must be rinsed out and refilled between each use. It does not come with a rice cooking level, all three levels are strainer types. Works as advertised. Easy to use. Grandma approved.
customer_reviews.author: Frederic

customer_reviews.title: Good Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Good thing, works really well. For some food needs more time to cook but it says in description. Can’t complain
customer_reviews.author: Vea Vesper

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money. I use it everyday and so far it's doing a great job
customer_reviews.author: Anchal

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR QUICK STEAMING
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Works great and makes steaming veggies and some meats easy and quick especially with the 3 tiers! It is also pretty easy to clean. I've not had any issue with food sticking. Plus the steaming containers are pretty large and hold a nice quantity of food.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: I freakin love this thing. I originally bought it to help make large batches of baby food but we also use it to make a meal. The meat always comes out perfectly moist. So glad we got this.
customer_reviews.author: Giles Family

customer_reviews.title: I really like this steamer it cooks evenly & you can use ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this steamer it cooks evenly & you can use 1 or 2 or all 3 plastic bowls. It was on sale for $19 & I was blessed when I got this steamer....
customer_reviews.author: BJ Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Steamer Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a present to my soon who has been a cook for over ten years. This was a set that he was thrilled to get for his home cooking. When he cooks for me at my home he steams a lot of vegetables in steaming bags so this will save him a lot of time and energy not to mention the cost of the bags. Will highly recommend to friends and family and encourage Amazon buyers to add this to their kitchen appliances.
customer_reviews.author: nan warner

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first but love this steamer now
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I received this steamer it has been put to work. And it has worked well. We have been eating fresh vegetables without the additives you get in a can. Skeptical at first but love this steamer now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its cheap. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Well. It does do the trick. Buutt... the plastic is very very thin and flimsy. Ok. The whole thing is flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done I guess. The water ...
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done I guess. The water actually boils up to the top of the first tier so its really boiling your food, not steaming it. The steam baskets are quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Martine Lyons

customer_reviews.title: but it works great and is really nice for limited counter space like ...
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely small, the picture is deceiving, but it works great and is really nice for limited counter space like in a motor home or small apartment. The plastic is kinda thin and the rice bowl is VERY small. If you have more than 2 people to feed it will be a good idea to spend the 8 more bucks to get a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: COOK SHUT OFF
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LIKE THIS STEAMER COOKS QUICK FAST AND SHUTS OFF WHEN COOKING IS DONE YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED ENJOY
customer_reviews.author: MaryNelson

customer_reviews.title: BEST thing I ever brought
customer_reviews.text: BEST thing I ever brought!!!! Use it often and it has helped me to lose over 40 pounds thus far!! For the price, I Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Annainnc

customer_reviews.title: In got this because a lot how the reviews mentioned ...
customer_reviews.text: In got this because a lot how the reviews mentioned a rice bowl. Mine didn't come with one which is a huge bummer because that rice bowl is primarily why I picked this one. Lame
customer_reviews.author: Brodacious

product_meta.title: Ovente Electric Food Steamer 7.5 Quart with 3 Tier Stackable Portable BPA-Free Baskets for Cooking Vegetable and Fish, 400 Watt Power Countertop Steamer Fast Steaming with 60-Minute Timer, White FS53W
product_meta.description:
Size:FS53WSteaming food to Perfection 

Did you know that steaming food is the healthiest cooking method around? Unlike other cooking methods steaming doesn't require the food to be immersed in liquid or cooked by fire. It works this way. The water reaches 212 °F and vaporizes into a smoky mist. 

This gentle steam then rises enters the small holes in the steamer and wraps in your food like a warm blanket until they're perfectly cooked inside and out! this method allows the food to cook in its own juice. Hence the food's original texture flavor and nutritional value are retained. What's good about this is you do not need fancy equipment to do it! 

With Ovente 3-tier electric food steamer FS53 series you bring out the Zest and tenderness of food while keeping it hearty and low-fat! Just squeeze a lemon or drizzle homemade spices on your steamed meat and vegetables and you have your healthy meal! 

Key features 
3-tier stackable containers: It has 3-tier stackable containers that accommodate 2 qt/82 oz of food per container (7 5 qt on all 3) 
Put veggies on one container potatoes on the second Salmon on the third one and steam them all at the same time! 
400W motor: Its efficient 400W motor makes the electric steamer ideal for steaming a wide variety of food like dumplings mussels meat fish and more! 
Timer: This one makes cooking undemanding it has a 60-minute timer with one-minute intervals. 
Simply set the timer so you do not have to constantly check if your food is ready. 
Auto shut-off: you won't worry even if you accidentally left the steamer plugged in the appliance automatically goes off when (1) There is not enough water in the tank or (2) the timer is up! 
Also you can check if it is turned on If the indicator light is illuminated. 
Steaming Chart: follow the steaming Chart for how long you steam a particular food so you get perfectly steamed food every time!
feature_bullets: FAST, EASY, DELICIOUS (JUST ADD WATER) – 400 Watts of power steam your favorite vegetables, seafood, meat, eggs, dumplings and all kinds of dim sum within minutes! Keeps everything fresh and moist—perfect for meal prep.

HEALTHY – Steaming is the #1 healthiest cooking method and soon you won’t be missing the others. It lowers cholesterol because it requires no oil and keeps your food’s natural structure and color while locking in nutrients vitamins and minerals.

SAFE & CONVENIENT – Comes equipped with a 60-minute timer with 15-minute intervals so only little supervision is needed. Also comes with a power indicator light and Auto Shut-off when timer is up and/or water tank is empty.
TIME-SAVER – Comes with 3-tiers of stackable containers (2 qt/82 oz capacity each) so you can cook different kinds of foods all at the same time. Total capacity is 7.5 quarts.

1-YEAR WARRANTY on Domestic (USA) Repairs and Replacements on workmanship and materials from date of purchase from authorized reseller. International inquiries please contact manufacturer customer service directly for better assistance.
